summary.para: Stops tracking leaks for the current thread.
Starts tracking leaks for the current thread.
Gets a value indicating whether leak tracking is turned on for the current thread.

returns.para: TRUE if leak tracking is turned on for the current thread; otherwise, FALSE.

summary.para: Controls debug settings for Microsoft DirectX Graphics Infrastructure (DXGI). You can use the IDXGIDebug1 interface in Windows Store apps.

remarks.para: Call the function to obtain the IDXGIDebug1 interface.
The IDXGIDebug1 interface can be used only if the debug layer is turned on. For more info, see Debug Layer.
